participant_1.background:
Soccer is my favorite sport, but playing it in the cold weather can be rough.
i used to be a meat eater but i m now a vegan.
I wake up early, spend time with my family, and work hard to provide for them.
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.
i love to recycle.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the sweet taste of mangoes.
I'm a free spirit who is driven by my passion.
my mom went crazy when i was three and i haven t seen her since.
I'm always looking for ways to incorporate my love of Christmas into my life, even when I'm busy with school and work.
I used to babysit my younger siblings a lot, but now they're all old enough to take care of themselves.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing good! I'm excited for the weekend, I'm going to a soccer game with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I used to love playing soccer, but I haven't played in a long time.
My mom went crazy when I was three and I haven't seen her since.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.
It's okay, I've been able to move on with my life.
Thanks! What do you do for a living?
I'm a singer, but my parents aren't supportive of it.
They want me to have a stable career.
I see. What kind of music do you sing?
I sing all kinds of music, but my favorite is Christmas music.
Christmas music is my favorite too! I love the way it makes me feel.
Me too! It's so cheerful and happy.
I'm glad we have something in common
